review: The Fire TV Stick serves the purpose as advertised.  Here are my Pro's and Con's after about 4 months of usage:Pros:• Easy to hook-up/install: the process is very intuitive and requires no tools.  From opening the package to using the product took 10 minutes• A relatively surprising library of Apps for various streaming type servicesCons:• Loses Wifi connection periodically and manual reconnect is required• Appears to lack enough allocated memory so there’s often a “buffer lag” when streaming• Does not compare with the ease of use such as iPhone, iPad, and Fire HDX7Overall this is a decent product and would be ideal for people that don't have a good smart phone or table and would like to stream movies/tv programs/music at home to watch on a real TV screen.

review: Easy to install and the interface is clean.  I have about 5 different media players of this type and this is one of the more easier ones to get up and running. The best way to watch Prime Instant Video in a portable way.  App available for it are not the greatest, but pleasantly surprised there is a way to side load android apps that are not available for direct download on the device using an Android phone.  A little tricky to get mouse based apps to work, but it can be done.
